NetworkProperty.Name: EnableNetworkPhysicsGrabComponent
NetworkProperty.Description: Determines whether NetworkNetworkPhysicsGrabComponent is enabled or disabled

NetworkProperty.Name: GrabbingEntityTranslation
NetworkProperty.Description: Grabbing entity translation of the autonomous player, replicated to the server for spherecasts and grab position calculations

NetworkProperty.Name: GrabbingEntityRotation
NetworkProperty.Description: Grabbing entity rotation of the autonomous player, replicated to the server for spherecasts and grab orientation calculations

NetworkProperty.Name: CurrentGrabDistance
NetworkProperty.Description: Distance from the grabbing entity to the grabbed object's translation, replicated to the server
